text: Seo Woo-jin (born 23 July, 2015) is a South Korean child actor and model. He is known for his roles in dramas such as The Light in Your Eyes, VIP and Love with Flaws. He is best known for his role in the hit drama Hi Bye, Mama! as the daughter, Cho Seo-woo. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
